name: #09 - Form
description:
(Unmute Sound for Optimal Experience)

Fragment 09 - Form
(From the BINARY EMOTIONS series)

"The ideal and the beautiful are identical; the ideal corresponds to the idea, and beauty to form; hence idea and substance are cognate."

Form: It's dedicated to the process of craft and how one could take ages to perfect form. Human beings are forms of the highest order crafted meticulously by divine power yet with the lack of proper self form we crumble like dust. As it is said that "Art is nothing without form"; hence we are nothing without understanding its principles.
--
"BINARY EMOTIONS" is a series based on 12 Single Edition Fragments in which the artist aims to translate his inner nuances within a specific moment into visuals that evoke certain emotions. An emotional journey digitized into a binary piece cataloged onto the blockchain.
